
# Other Professional Experience

```{r other_prof_experience, include = TRUE, eval=TRUE}
prof_data <- rbind(
    tibble(
        what = "Test Administrator",
        URL = "",
        when = "September 2020 - Present",
        with = "Société de transport de Montréal (STM), Division - Staffing and Workforce Planning",
        where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
        details = c("Administered standardized tests in personnel selection processes at STM, ensuring standardized procedures and supporting staffing and workforce planning.")
    ),
    tibble(
        what = "Administrative Assistant (interim) -- Ethics Committee for Student Projects (CERPE)",
        URL = "",
        when = "September 2024 - October 2024",
        with = "Faculty of Human Sciences, Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
        where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
        details = c(
            "Managed and responded to emails sent to the CERPE information inbox, including screening requests, providing first-line answers, and redirecting enquiries as needed.",
            "Ensured continuity of service and up-to-date handling of the inbox during the temporary replacement of the regular staff member."
        )
    )
)

detailed_entries(prof_data, with, when, what, where, details, .protect = FALSE)
```
